alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 9:34PM MDT until March 15 at 7:00AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Soldiers Meadow Road, Winchester, and Craigmont. * WHEN...Until 6 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow will melt on area roads early this evening, but with cooling road temperatures, the snow will likely begin to accumulate over all areas.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
